page.name: Hope Squad
page.description:
Hope Squad is a peer-to-peer suicide prevention program. Students are trained in QPR (question-persuade-refer) and SOS (signs of suicide) so that they can identify a friend in crisis and refer them to a mental health professional. Students are nominated to Hope Squad by their peers and meet as a class during the school day.

Students in need of support can reach a Hope Squad member through the peer connection form: https://forms.gle/oD2GpXFVez1eekXn6
